volumeInfo.subtitle: An Integrated Approach
volumeInfo.description: Theundisputed #1 market leading bookcontinues to be an innovative look at the most current changes and happenings in the auditing profession! Topics appear as they would during the audit planning and execution stage rather than as isolated pieces of information.Fraud detection; integration of SECTION 404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 and related SEC and PCAOB rulemakings; internal controls -- Internal Control and Control Risk.For individuals interested in the auditing, accounting, and consulting fields.
volumeInfo.title: Auditing and Assurance Services

searchInfo.textSnippet: For the core Auditing course for accounting majors. Arens stays ahead of other auditing texts by consistently integrating current developments in the audit profession.
